articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Saudi Arabia appeals for calm after killing of Iranian general
articles.description: Saudi Arabia's foreign minister said on Monday the kingdom does not want to see further escalation of tensions in the region at a "very dangerous moment", following Friday's killing by a U.S. drone of Iran's most prominent military commander.
articles.content: RIYADH (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia’s foreign minister said on Monday the kingdom does not want to see further escalation of tensions in the region at a “very dangerous moment”, following Friday’s killing by a U.S. drone of Iran’s most prominent military commande… [+492 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Solskjaer wants Lingard back to his best after cut back on social media
articles.description: Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer believes Jesse Lingard has toned down his social media activity in order to recapture his best form in the second half of the campaign.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer believes Jesse Lingard has toned down his social media activity in order to recapture his best form in the second half of the campaign.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: China eyes increased ties with Kiribati, site of space tracking station
articles.description: China said on Monday it hoped to expand newly restored ties with the Pacific state of Kiribati, site of a strategic but mothballed Chinese space tracking station, in comments that may further stoke U.S. anxiety about Beijing's growing influence.

articles.author: Nick Said
articles.title: Patient Sibley, explosive Stokes continue England domination
articles.description: Opener Dom Sibley struck a patient maiden century and Ben Stokes produced fireworks at the other end as England raced to 375 for seven at lunch on the fourth day of the second test against South Africa on Monday.
articles.content:
CAPE TOWN (Reuters) - Opener Dom Sibley struck a patient maiden century and Ben Stokes produced fireworks at the other end as England raced to 375 for seven at lunch on the fourth day of the second test against South Africa on Monday.

articles.author: Elias Biryabarema
articles.title: Uganda police disperse supporters of Museveni challenger with tear gas
articles.description: Police in Uganda on Monday fired tear gas to disperse supporters of pop star and presidential hopeful Bobi Wine when he tried to hold a rally, underscoring the hurdles he faces as he seeks to unseat long ruling President Yoweri Museveni, 75.
articles.content: KAMPALA (Reuters) - Police in Uganda on Monday fired tear gas to disperse supporters of pop star and presidential hopeful Bobi Wine when he tried to hold a rally, underscoring the hurdles he faces as he seeks to unseat long ruling President Yoweri Museveni, 7… [+453 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Awkwafina, 'Dunkirk' star Lowden among nominees for BAFTA Rising Star
articles.description: Golden Globe winner Awkwafina and "Dunkirk" actor Jack Lowden are among the nominees for this year's EE Rising Star Award, the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) said on Monday.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Golden Globe winner Awkwafina and “Dunkirk” actor Jack Lowden are among the nominees for this year’s EE Rising Star Award, the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) said on Monday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Louis Dreyfus owner pledges her stake as collateral in $1 billion Credit Suisse loan: filing
articles.description: Margarita Louis-Dreyfus borrowed $1 billion from Credit Suisse last year to buy out minority shareholders of Louis Dreyfus Company (LDC) and pledged her majority stake in the commodities trader as collateral, a company filing showed.
articles.content:
PARIS (Reuters) - Margarita Louis-Dreyfus borrowed $1 billion from Credit Suisse last year to buy out minority shareholders of Louis Dreyfus Company (LDC) and pledged her majority stake in the commodities trader as collateral, a company filing showed.
